column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Thank you for taking the time to write a review
column2: Susie! Sorry to hear you were disappointed with the pizza you received. We do spread a thin layer of sauce on top of our pizzas however
column3: we always encourage our guests to order their pizza to their liking so if you would like extra sauce
column4: you got it! We hope you'll give us another try the next time you are in town. Thanks again for your review.
